scripts.setup: meteor remove blaze-html-templates autopublish;meteor add herokit:angular-jade coffeescript@1.11.1_4 angular-templates pbastowski:angular-babel tmeasday:publish-counts pagebakers:ionicons planettraining:material-design-icons jalik:ufs jalik:ufs-gridfs;meteor npm install;meteor npm install --production wechat-api angular angular-meteor babel-runtime angular-ui-router angular-utils-pagination lodash angular-aria angular-animate angular-material ng-file-upload ng-img-crop c3 c3-angularjs angular-sortable-view ionic-sdk cson angular-sanitize;meteor run --no-release-check --port 3001
